reviewText: I thought I was buying the English version but it's in french...oh well
This box set rules, the pyramid head is not made out of plastic, its resin, it's worth my money, I love it!!!.

Well worth it..i paid a lot more for it in france. Most all region dvd players do let you play this.all the extras make this a real treasure. Mine came with a steelbook and art cards.etc etc etc. Yes its a high end item,its for diehard fans.

You should probably put on here that the it is not an American DVD (even though it's in English with French subtitles) and that it won't work in 99% of American digital products. I've been waiting weeks for this and was terribly let down.
Price is terrible. Lower the price to like 50 bucks and we have a deal
